text: The Slowest Train () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Krasnopolskiy and Valeriy Uskov.Большая актриса маленьких ролейСАМЫЙ МЕДЛЕННЫЙ ПОЕЗД (1963) It stars Pavel Kadochnikov, Nonna Terentyeva, and Zinaida Kirienko. == Actors == * Pavel Kadochnikov * Nonna Terentyeva as Lena (as Nonna Novosyadlova) * Zinaida Kirienko as Nina Ivanovna * Anatoli Barchuk as Kolya * Marina Burova as girl * Alla Surkova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1963 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Slowest Train
